org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.http.netconfcentral.org.ns.toaster.rev091120

Interface ToasterService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpendaylightToaster

    public interface ToasterService
extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.RpcService
    Interface for implementing the following YANG RPCs defined in module toaster
    (Source path: META-INF/yang/toaster.yang): 
     rpc cancel-toast {
     "Stop making toast, if any is being made.
                A 'resource-denied' error will be returned 
                if the toaster service is disabled.";
     status CURRENT;
 }
 rpc make-toast {
     "Make some toast.
                The toastDone notification will be sent when 
                the toast is finished.
                An 'in-use' error will be returned if toast
                is already being made.
                A 'resource-denied' error will be returned 
                if the toaster service is disabled.";
     input {
         leaf toasterDoneness {
             type uint32;
         }
         leaf toasterToastType {
             type identityref;
         }
     }
     
     status CURRENT;
 }
 rpc restock-toaster {
     "Restocks the toaster with the amount of bread specified.";
     input {
         leaf amountOfBreadToStock {
             type uint32;
         }
     }
     
     status CURRENT;
 }

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Stop making toast, if any is being made.

      Make some toast.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<java.lang.Void>> restockToaster(RestockToasterInput input)

    • Method Detail

      • cancelToast

        java.util.concurrent.Future<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<java.lang.Void>> cancelToast()
        Stop making toast, if any is being made. A 'resource-denied' error will be returned if the toaster service is disabled.

      • makeToast

        java.util.concurrent.Future<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<java.lang.Void>> makeToast(MakeToastInput input)
        Make some toast. The toastDone notification will be sent when the toast is finished. An 'in-use' error will be returned if toast is already being made. A 'resource-denied' error will be returned if the toaster service is disabled.

      • restockToaster

        java.util.concurrent.Future<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<java.lang.Void>> restockToaster(RestockToasterInput input)
        Restocks the toaster with the amount of bread specified.
